name: dioni-mara-website-astro
description: This is a template for [Payload CMS](https://payloadcms.com) and [Astro](https://astro.build) It is a simple blog template with a few pages and a blog post collection. It is fully typed with TypeScript.

scripts.==0==: ==== BUILDING THE IMAGE *DIONIMARA-PROXY* AND PULL TO THE DOCKER HUB ====
scripts.docker:traefik:deploy: npm run docker:traefik:build && npm run docker:traefik:commit && npm run docker:traefik:push
scripts.==1==: ==== BUILDING THE IMAGE *DIONIMARA-WEBSITE* AND PULL TO THE DOCKER HUB ====
scripts.docker:website:deploy: npm run docker:website:build && npm run docker:website:commit && npm run docker:website:push
scripts.==2==: ==== BUILDING THE IMAGE *DIONIMARA-PAYLOAD* AND PULL TO THE DOCKER HUB ====
scripts.docker:payload:deploy: npm run docker:payload:build && npm run docker:payload:commit && npm run docker:payload:push
scripts.docker:local:up: npm run widget:deploy && docker compose -p clockdown-local -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:prod:up: npm run widget:deploy && docker compose -p clockdown-prod -f docker-compose.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:prod:up:no-cache: npm run widget:deploy && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d --build --no-cache
